import React, { Component } from 'react'; import {connect} from 'react-redux'; import Validate from './../libs/validate'; import pic01 from './../images/pic_1.jpg'; class Form extends Component { constructor(props) { super(props); this.state = { number: 6}} handleChange = (event) => { let input = event.target.value.trim(); if(Validate.checkNum(input)===false){ alert('Number of Columns range from 3 to 12') }else { this.setState({number: input}) } event.preventDefault(); } render() { let {numberSelected} = this.props; return (

Please a number between 3 and 12

); } } const mapStateToProps = state => { return { numberSelected: state.numberSelected } } export default connect(mapStateToProps,null)(Form);
